scripts.bkend-deploy: cd udagram-api/www && eb init project-udagram-api -r $region -p node.js && eb use project-udagram-api-dev &&  eb setenv POSTGRES_HOST=$host POSTGRES_DB=$aws_database POSTGRES_USER=$username POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$password BCRYPT_PASSWORD=$BCRYPT_PASSWORD JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET SALT_ROUNDS=$SALT_ROUNDS ENV=$ENV PORT=$dbport && eb deploy
